snippet: St. Lawrence forward Greg Carey, St. Cloud State forward Nic Dowd and Boston College forward Johnny Gaudreau are the finalists for the award, given to the top player in college hockey.
abstract: St Lawrence forward Greg Carey, St Cloud State forward Nic Dowd and Boston College forward Johnny Gaudreau are finalists named for the Hobey Baker Memorial Award, given to the top player in college hockey.
lead_paragraph: St. Lawrence forward Greg Carey, St. Cloud State forward Nic Dowd and Boston College forward Johnny Gaudreau are the finalists for the award, given to the top player in college hockey.

headline.main: Three Finalists Named for Hobey Baker Award
headline.print_headline: Finalists Named for Hobey Baker Award
